R

run() - Method in class myChat.ClientUpdater
the "main" method of this thread which "listens" to the server and appends the text we get from it to the GUI
run() - Method in class myChat.ListenToPort
the "main" method of this thread which listents to servers port while the server socket is open, every time a client connects to this port (and ip..)
run() - Method in class myChat.MultiClientHandler
the "main" method of this thread which gets messages from the client and breaks them to parts to indicate which service is wanted from the sever, after figuring out what service is wanted the thread
